title: Mapeamento Initiative Analysis Charts
details:
Mapeamento completo dos gráficos da Initiative Analysis:

## TEMPORAL CHARTS (temporal_charts.py):
- plot_temporal_evolution_frequency() -> temporal/evolution_component.py
- plot_timeline_chart() -> temporal/timeline_component.py  
- plot_coverage_gaps_chart() -> temporal/gaps_component.py
- plot_temporal_availability_heatmap() -> temporal/coverage_component.py

## COMPARISON CHARTS (comparison_charts.py):
- plot_accuracy_resolution_scatter() -> comparison/accuracy_resolution_component.py
- plot_methodology_comparison() -> comparison/distributions_component.py
- plot_temporal_coverage_comparison() -> comparison/distributions_component.py
- plot_performance_radar() -> comparison/performance_heatmap_component.py
- plot_spatial_resolution_comparison() -> comparison/distributions_component.py
- plot_correlation_matrix() -> comparison/detailed_table_component.py

## DETAILED CHARTS (detailed_charts.py):
- create_dual_bars_chart() -> detailed/dual_bars_component.py
- create_radar_chart() -> detailed/radar_chart_component.py
- create_heatmap_chart() -> detailed/heatmap_component.py 
- create_distribution_plot() -> detailed/data_table_component.py

## PÁGINAS E ABAS:
### Temporal Analysis:
- Timeline (timeline_component.py)
- Evolution (evolution_component.py) 
- Coverage Heatmap (coverage_component.py)
- Gap Analysis (gaps_component.py)

### Comparative Analysis:
- Accuracy vs Resolution (accuracy_resolution_component.py)
- Distributions (distributions_component.py)  
- Performance Heatmap (performance_heatmap_component.py)
- Detailed Table (detailed_table_component.py)

### Detailed Analysis:
- Dual Bars (dual_bars_component.py)
- Radar Chart (radar_chart_component.py)
- Heatmap (heatmap_component.py)
- Data Table (data_table_component.py)
- Annual Coverage (annual_coverage_component.py)
